items.sentence: I didn\'t know that Tom and Mary were both still in prison.
Tom can swim faster than anyone else in his swimming class.
You should tell Tom that Mary is planning to join the team.
Tom was looking for some people to help him move his piano.
We were disappointed to hear that Tom couldn\'t get a visa.
We\'ll probably never be in Boston at the same time Tom is.
Did I ever tell you about what I did last summer in Boston?
I told Tom that we were going to Australia for a few weeks.
Tom locked himself in his bedroom and turned off the light.
Tom looked after my dog while I was traveling in Australia.
Tom packed all his belongings in a small suitcase and left.
I think there\'s a real good possibility of that happening.
I think we need to find out why Tom wasn\'t here yesterday.
I can see you\'re not as open-minded as I thought you were.
I asked Tom not to tell Mary about that, but he did anyway.
Tom won\'t do that right away, but he\'ll do it eventually.
There were many things that Tom wanted Mary to do that day.
Tom knew what he was doing was wrong, but he did it anyway.
Tom is smaller than Mary, but he runs faster than she does.
Tom tried to convince himself he was doing the right thing.
